Dealer - Class in model
Handles dealer specific operations, such as drawing cards to 16 and standing on 17 or above.
Dealer() - Constructor for class model.Dealer
Creates a new dealer
Deck - Class in model
Holds multiple cards and performs operations such as shuffling the deck
